description: Hamza al-Dahdouh was with colleagues when their car was reportedly hit in an Israeli air strike .
maintext: "Hamza was not just part of me. He was the whole of me. He was the soul of my soul. These are tears of sadness, of loss. These are tears of humanity," his father said at the funeral.
title: Al Jazeera bureau chief's son Hamza al-Dahdouh among journalists killed in Gaza
